review: They do work but it seems the connection between the device and the chromecast keeps dropping and/or the picture quality suffers and becomes very pixelated. If the connection holds, then these work well. I have stopped using the one I bought simply because I cannot get through one movie without it dropping connection at least a couple of times, which can be quite frustrating.
author: Edward Tan Kong Yong
